about.summary: Multiblock data analysis concerns the analysis of several sets of variables (blocks) observed on the same group of individuals. The main aims of the RGCCA package are: (i) to study the relationships between blocks and (ii) to identify subsets of variables of each block which are active in their relationships with the other blocks.

Multiblock data analysis concerns the analysis of several sets of variables (blocks) observed on the same group of individuals. The main aims of the RGCCA package are: (i) to study the relationships between blocks and (ii) to identify subsets of variables of each block which are active in their relationships with the other blocks.

name: r-rgcca
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.1.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rgcca
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/RGCCA_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/RGCCA/RGCCA_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 20f341fca8f616c556699790814debdf2ac7aa4dd9ace2071100c66af1549d7d

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1003
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-deriv
    - r-mass
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-deriv
    - r-mass

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('RGCCA')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('RGCCA')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=RGCCA
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'Multiblock data analysis concerns the analysis of several sets of variables (blocks)
    observed on the same group of individuals. The main aims of the RGCCA package are:
    (i) to study the relationships between blocks and (ii) to identify subsets of variables
    of each block which are active in their relationships with the other blocks. '
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - PertuyF
